tasks.title: Conserve water
tasks.body: Turn off the tap when brushing your teeth or washing dishes.

tasks.title: Go paperless
tasks.body: Use digital receipts instead of physical ones to reduce unnecessary printing.

tasks.title: Compost organic waste
tasks.body: Create a compost bin for yard waste and food scraps.

tasks.title: Plant a tree
tasks.body: Help improve air quality by simply planting a tree.

tasks.title: Switch to renewable energy
tasks.body: Install solar panels or choose renewable energy plans if available.

tasks.title: Adopt sustainable transportation
tasks.body: Consider using an electric vehicle or carpooling regularly.
